alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 03 at 11:41AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Box Elder. * WHEN...Until 145 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1141 AM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Brigham City, Tremonton, Perry, Willard, Bear River City, Corinne, Plymouth, Howell, Riverside, Garland, Honeyville, Elwood, Fielding, Deweyville, Penrose, Thatcher, Bothwell, Bear River and Collinston.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
